document_data.name: ''Shield of the Order''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Shield of the Order''''' was a unique [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] shield associated withe the [[Order of the Radiant Heart]].
document_data.Powers: The shield held a powerful ''+5 enchantment'' and bolstered the inherent mental and physical defenses of its wielder.
document_data.History:
The shield once belonged to the brave knight of the Radiant Heart, [[Peragath|Peragath the Valiant]]. He carried it during his final battle on [[Toril]], against a horde of [[tanar'ri]] that were invading the [[Prime Material plane|prime]] via a ''[[portal]]'' linked to the [[astral plane]]. It was lost for quite some time when Peragath lept through the ''portal'' in pursuit of the demonic forces.

By the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, the shield came into the possession of the [[fire giant]] [[Yaga-Shura]], who carried it with him during the siege of [[Saradush]].
